title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

trailer.description: The Ministry's denial turns Hogwarts into a dystopia in this gripping trailer

summary: After witnessing Voldemort's return and being abandoned by the wizarding world that doubts him, a traumatized Harry faces expulsion for using magic against Dementors in Little Whinging. Rescued by the re-formed Order of the Phoenix, he discovers the Ministry has installed the saccharine-but-sadistic Dolores Umbridge as High Inquisitor at Hogwarts. As Umbridge bans practical defense magic and punishes dissent with blood-quill torture ('I must not tell lies'), Harry secretly trains students in Dumbledore's Army within the Room of Requirement. Voldemort's mental intrusions grow stronger, culminating in a vision that lures Harry to the Department of Mysteries, where a deadly battle with Death Eaters results in Sirius Black falling through the mysterious veil. Dumbledore finally confirms Harry's connection to Voldemort's mind and reveals the prophecy: 'Neither can live while the other survives.' The film ends with the Ministry forced to acknowledge Voldemort's return as darkness fully descends.
